Player History
Drafted in 23rd round, 356th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Injured on 4/19/2015 with a Bruised Finger, out for 3 days...
Injured on 4/24/2015 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 5/24/2016 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/16/2017, off James Lashley (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/24/2017, off Jeremy Fletcher (NY)...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,365,714 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,365,714 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Chicago to Montreal on 3/2/2019 (Going to CHI: 1B Darrell Coleman. Going to MON: 1B Ralph Keiper, C Alberto Perez, P Robert Brinn, CF Robert Straight, P Terry Katz)...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 3/7/2019.
Released by Houston on 5/1/2019...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 3/1/2020 to a minor league contract.
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,528,571 through salary arbitration...
